articles.title: Babies born in UK with DNA from 3 people: Medical breakthrough could prevent genetic disorders - Deccan Herald
articles.description: Genetic Breakthrough: UK confirms 8 babies born using 3-person IVF technique to block inherited diseases; MDT offers new hope for families.

articles.author: Tejasri Gururaj
articles.title: Scientists detect lithium in Mercury's exosphere using magnetic wave analysis - Phys.org
articles.description: Using a cutting-edge magnetic wave detection technique, a new study in Nature Communications has identified lithium in Mercury's exosphere for the first time.
articles.content:
Using a cutting-edge magnetic wave detection technique, a new study in Nature Communications has identified lithium in Mercury's exosphere for the first time.
